content: free crochet pattern for making a cute little crochet butterfly in just one round it is easy and very quick to make and includes step-by-step photos to help you **recommended yarn ** it uses a very small amount of yarn so is perfect for yarn scraps depending on how big you want your butterfly to be you can use any yarn examples shown on the pattern include the following small #2 weight 4ply with c-3mm hook medium #3 weight dk with e-3 5mm hook large #4 worsted weight acrylic with g-4 5mm hook extra large #4 worsted weight cotton with h-5mm hook **are you on my email list ** i offer exclusive discounts on new pattern releases for my email subscribers and you ll always hear of any offers and events i m taking part in if you would like to join just click below join email list 1 **note on selling items and copyright** the pattern and all images belong to janferie mackintosh all rights reserved please do not copy or redistribute any part of the pattern you may not alter it to make your own pattern from it yes you may sell your finished items handmade by you in small batches only credit to me as the designer is appreciated and please always use your own photos so you show your own work **please note that instant download pdfs files cannot be refunded ** 1 https //thecraftytherapist com/subscribe/
